public ref class RegiisUtility sealed : System::Web::Management::IRegiisUtility

summary.span: 提供授權公用程式，以支援特定的 Web 應用程式組態、組件登錄和組件金鑰容器的管理。

span.span: Provides authorization utilities to support specific Web-application configuration, assembly registration, and assembly-key container manipulation.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供公用程式函式支援`system.web`註冊組件。The class provides utility functions that support the `system.web` assembly registration.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它根據介面。It is based on the interface.

summary.span: 允許系統根據提供的參數，執行組態區段和組件金鑰容器的特殊管理。

span.span: Allows specific manipulation of configuration sections and assembly-key containers based on the supplied parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在內部用來保護且取消保護組態內的各節。The method is used internally to protect and unprotect sections within the configuration. 方法也支援組件金鑰容器的管理。The method also supports assembly-key container manipulation.

abstract member RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly : int * string * string * -> unit override this.RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly : int * string * string * -> unit

param.name: doReg
param.span: 0 表示應該取消登錄組件，其他值則表示應該登錄組件。

span.span: 0 indicates that the assembly should be unregistered; otherwise, the assembly should be registered.
The type of the assembly.
The path of the binary directory.
The exception to display.

summary.span: 允許登錄或取消登錄正在執行的 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 組件。

span.span: Allows the executing Microsoft Management Console (MMC) assembly to be registered or unregistered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內部用來登錄或取消登錄正在執行的 MMC 組件。Used internally to register or unregister the executing MMC assembly.

summary.span: 允許解除安裝具備瀏覽器功能的程式碼產生器。
